snippet: U.S. weapons maker Raytheon has signed a letter of intent with Polish military software producer WB Electronics to cooperate in bidding for a contract to build Poland's planned anti-missile system, Polish state radio said on its website....

headline.print_headline: Raytheon Links With Poland's WB Electronics in Missile Shield Bid
headline.main: Raytheon Links With Poland's WB Electronics in Missile Shield Bid

lead_paragraph: U.S. weapons maker Raytheon has signed a letter of intent with Polish military software producer WB Electronics to cooperate in bidding for a contract to build Poland's planned anti-missile system, Polish state radio said on its website.
